SELECT o.`node_name`, o.`identity_id`, oe.`identity_ip`, oe.`identity_port`, oe.`is_public` as public_flag FROM `dc_org` o join `mo_org_expand` oe on o.`identity_id` = oe.`identity_id` WHERE `status` = 1 AND (oe.`is_public` = 1 OR o.`identity_id` IN ( SELECT `identity_id` FROM `mo_org_user` WHERE `address` = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
